caption.title: Studied populations with their georeferences and genetic diversity and haplotypes.

tr.td: Mexico, San Juan del Rio, Dgo
Mexico, Santa María del Oro, Dgo
Mexico, Sierra de San Miguel, NL

fn.p: Populations studied, indicating population abbreviation, number of plants, geographic region, latitude and longitude where they were collected, as well as molecular diversity indices and their respective haplotypes. San Luis Potosi (SLP), Coah (Coahuila), Zacatecas (Zac), Nuevo Leon (NL), Durango (Dgo), Chihuahua (Chih), Hidalgo (Hgo), Haplotype diversity ( h), nucleotide diversity (π).
